definitions.definition: The act of licking ; a stroke of the tongue.
examples: The cat gave its fur a lick .

definitions.definition: The amount of some substance obtainable with a single lick.
examples: Give me a lick of ice cream.

definitions.definition: A quick and careless application of anything, as if by a stroke of the tongue.
examples: to put on colours with a lick of the brush

definitions.definition: A place where animals lick minerals from the ground.
examples: The birds gathered at the clay lick .

definitions.definition: A small watercourse or ephemeral stream . It ranks between a rill and a stream .
examples: We used to play in the lick .
Hit that wedge a good lick with the sledgehammer.

definitions.definition: ( colloquial , chiefly in the negative ) A small amount; a whit .
examples: You don't have a lick of sense.
I didn't do a lick of work today.
There are some really good blues licks in this solo.

definitions.definition: ( informal ) A rate of speed . ( Always qualified by good , fair , or a similar adjective. )
examples: The bus was travelling at a good lick when it swerved and left the road.
You up for a lick tonight?

main_definition: The act of licking ; a stroke of the tongue.
secondary_definitions: The amount of some substance obtainable with a single lick.
A quick and careless application of anything, as if by a stroke of the tongue.
A place where animals lick minerals from the ground.
A small watercourse or ephemeral stream . It ranks between a rill and a stream .
( colloquial , chiefly in the negative ) A small amount; a whit .
( informal ) A rate of speed . ( Always qualified by good , fair , or a similar adjective. )

definitions.definition: An instance or opportunity to earn money fast, usually by illegal means, thus a heist , drug deal etc. or its victim; mostly used in phrasal verbs: hit a lick , hit licks

main_definition: An instance or opportunity to earn money fast, usually by illegal means, thus a heist , drug deal etc. or its victim; mostly used in phrasal verbs: hit a lick , hit licks
